description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，曾任第102-103任内阁总理大臣及自由民主党总裁。历任防卫大臣、农林水产大臣、自由民主党干事长等要职。
description.en: Japanese politician who served as the 102nd and 103rd Prime Minister of Japan and President of the Liberal Democratic Party. He has held key posts including Minister of Defense, Minister of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries, and LDP Secretary-General.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，石破茂之父。曾任建设事务次官及鸟取县知事。
description.en: Japanese politician, father of Shigeru Ishiba. He served as Vice-Minister of Construction and Governor of Tottori Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，前内阁总理大臣。石破二朗的朋友，曾劝说石破茂进入政界。
description.en: Japanese politician and former Prime Minister. A friend of Jirō Ishiba who persuaded Shigeru Ishiba to enter politics.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京都的著名私立研究型综合大学，石破茂的母校。
description.en: A prestigious private research university in Tokyo, Japan, and the alma mater of Shigeru Ishiba.

description.zh-cn: 日本的主要银行之一，石破茂在进入政界前曾在此工作。
description.en: One of the major banks in Japan, where Shigeru Ishiba worked before entering politics.

description.zh-cn: 日本的主要政党，长期执政。石破茂是该党的重要成员，并曾担任总裁。
description.en: A major political party in Japan and the long-term ruling party. Shigeru Ishiba is a key member and formerly served as its president.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，新进党的党首，石破茂曾因对他失望而回归自民党。
description.en: Japanese politician, leader of the New Frontier Party, with whom Shigeru Ishiba was disappointed, leading to Ishiba's return to the LDP.

description.zh-cn: 1990年代存在的日本政党，由小泽一郎领导。石破茂曾短暂加入该党。
description.en: A Japanese political party that existed in the 1990s, led by Ichirō Ozawa. Shigeru Ishiba briefly joined this party.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，前内阁总理大臣。石破茂在其内阁中首次入阁，担任防卫厅长官。
description.en: Japanese politician and former Prime Minister. Shigeru Ishiba first entered the cabinet under him as Director General of the Defense Agency.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，前内阁总理大臣。石破茂在其内阁中担任防卫大臣。
description.en: Japanese politician and former Prime Minister. Shigeru Ishiba served as Minister of Defense in his cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，前内阁总理大臣。曾在2008年自民党总裁选举中击败石破茂，后任命石破茂为农林水产大臣。
description.en: Japanese politician and former Prime Minister. He defeated Shigeru Ishiba in the 2008 LDP presidential election and later appointed him as Minister of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，前内阁总理大臣。曾在2012年自民党总裁选举中击败石破茂，后任命石破茂为自民党干事长。
description.en: Japanese politician and former Prime Minister. He defeated Shigeru Ishiba in the 2012 LDP presidential election and later appointed him as LDP Secretary-General.

description.zh-cn: 由石破茂于2015年9月在自由民主党内组建的政治派系。
description.en: A political faction within the Liberal Democratic Party formed by Shigeru Ishiba in September 2015.

description.zh-cn: 日本自由民主党的党内选举，石破茂在该次选举中获胜，成为新任总裁。
description.en: An internal election of Japan's Liberal Democratic Party, in which Shigeru Ishiba won and became the new president.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，在2024年自民党总裁选举中与石破茂竞争，后接替石破茂成为内阁总理大臣。
description.en: Japanese politician who competed with Shigeru Ishiba in the 2024 LDP presidential election and later succeeded him as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 日本的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government position in Japan.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，石破茂的前任内阁总理大臣和自由民主党总裁。
description.en: Japanese politician, Shigeru Ishiba's predecessor as Prime Minister of Japan and President of the Liberal Democratic Party.

nodes.id: 第50届日本众议院议员总选举

zh-cn: 第50届日本众议院议员总选举

description.zh-cn: 由石破茂上任后宣布举行的众议院选举，执政的自民党在该次选举中惨败。
description.en: A House of Representatives election called by Shigeru Ishiba after taking office, in which the ruling LDP suffered a major defeat.

description.zh-cn: 日本参议院选举，执政联盟的再次失败导致了要求石破茂辞职的压力。
description.en: An election for the House of Councillors in Japan. Another defeat for the ruling coalition led to pressure for Shigeru Ishiba to resign.

description.zh-cn: 时任日本首相安倍晋三在2015年发表的关于战后70周年的谈话，对石破茂发表战后80周年见解构成了一定的政治阻力。
description.en: A statement on the 70th anniversary of the end of World War II issued by then-Prime Minister Shinzo Abe in 2015, which posed political resistance to Shigeru Ishiba's plan to issue a statement on the 80th anniversary.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂在2025年10月10日以个人名义发表的关于战后80周年的看法，分析了日本走向战争的原因并强调了文官统制的重要性。
description.en: A personal view issued by Shigeru Ishiba on October 10, 2025, regarding the 80th anniversary of the end of World War II, analyzing the reasons Japan went to war and emphasizing the importance of civilian control.

description.zh-cn: 自由民主党内由前首相安倍晋三领导的保守派系（清和政策研究会）的通称，在安倍去世后被称为旧安倍派。该派系对石破茂发表战后80周年见解持反对态度。
description.en: The common name for the conservative faction (Seiwa Seisaku Kenkyūkai) within the LDP led by former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, referred to as the Old Abe Faction after his death. The faction opposed Shigeru Ishiba's issuance of a statement on the 80th anniversary of the end of WWII.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任美国国防部长。于2007年与时任防卫大臣的石破茂会面。
description.en: American statesman who served as the United States Secretary of Defense. He met with Shigeru Ishiba, then Minister of Defense, in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 日本东京都的特别区之一，是石破茂的出生地。
description.en: A special ward of Tokyo, Japan, and the birthplace of Shigeru Ishiba.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本中国地方的县，是石破茂的成长地和政治选区。
description.en: A prefecture in the Chūgoku region of Japan, where Shigeru Ishiba grew up and which is his political constituency.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Shigeru Ishiba.

description.zh-cn: 日本第126代天皇，石破茂担任内阁总理大臣期间的国家元首。
description.en: The 126th Emperor of Japan, and the head of state during Shigeru Ishiba's tenure as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，前内阁总理大臣。在石破茂担任自民党总裁期间任副总裁。
description.en: Japanese politician and former Prime Minister. Served as Vice President of the LDP when Shigeru Ishiba was President.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物。在石破茂担任自民党总裁期间任干事长。
description.en: Japanese politician. Served as Secretary-General of the LDP when Shigeru Ishiba was President.

description.zh-cn: 日本自由民主党总裁选举，石破茂在第二轮投票中败于安倍晋三。
description.en: The LDP presidential election where Shigeru Ishiba was defeated by Shinzo Abe in the second round of voting.

description.zh-cn: 日本自由民主党总裁选举，石破茂败于麻生太郎。
description.en: The LDP presidential election where Shigeru Ishiba was defeated by Tarō Asō.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂是石破二朗的儿子。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba is the son of Jirō Ishiba.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂于1983年与石破佳子结婚。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba married Yoshiko Ishiba in 1983.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂于1957年2月4日出生于东京都千代田区。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba was born in Chiyoda, Tokyo on February 4, 1957.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂于1979年毕业于庆应义塾大学法学部法学科。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba graduated from the Faculty of Law, Department of Law at Keio University in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂在1979年至1983年期间于三井银行工作。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba worked at Mitsui Bank from 1979 to 1983.

description.zh-cn: 在石破二朗于1981年去世后，其朋友田中角荣劝说石破茂继承父亲遗志，踏入政界。
description.en: After Jirō Ishiba's death in 1981, his friend Kakuei Tanaka persuaded Shigeru Ishiba to follow his father's will and enter politics.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂于1986年作为自民党成员首次当选国会议员，1993年退党，并于1997年回归自民党。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba was first elected to the Diet as a member of the LDP in 1986, left the party in 1993, and returned in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂在1993年退出自民党后曾加入新进党，直到1997年回归自民党。
description.en: After leaving the LDP in 1993, Shigeru Ishiba joined the New Frontier Party until he returned to the LDP in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 由于对新进党的党首小泽一郎感到失望，石破茂于1997年回归自民党。
description.en: Due to his disappointment with Ichirō Ozawa, the leader of the New Frontier Party, Shigeru Ishiba returned to the LDP in 1997.

position.en: Director General of the Defense Agency

description.zh-cn: 石破茂在小泉纯一郎内阁中担任防卫厅长官。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba served as Director General of the Defense Agency in the cabinet of Junichiro Koizumi.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂在福田康夫内阁中担任防卫大臣。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba served as Minister of Defense in the cabinet of Yasuo Fukuda.

description.zh-cn: 在2008年9月的自民党总裁选举中，石破茂败于麻生太郎。
description.en: In the LDP presidential election of September 2008, Shigeru Ishiba was defeated by Tarō Asō.

position.en: Minister of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries

description.zh-cn: 石破茂在麻生太郎内阁中担任农林水产大臣。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba served as Minister of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries in the cabinet of Tarō Asō.

description.zh-cn: 在2012年9月的自民党总裁选举中，石破茂在第二轮投票中败于安倍晋三。
description.en: In the LDP presidential election of September 2012, Shigeru Ishiba was defeated by Shinzo Abe in the second round of voting.

description.zh-cn: 在2012年总裁选举后，安倍晋三邀请石破茂出任自由民主党干事长。
description.en: After the 2012 presidential election, Shinzo Abe invited Shigeru Ishiba to serve as Secretary-General of the Liberal Democratic Party.

position.en: Secretary-General of the Liberal Democratic Party

description.zh-cn: 在安倍晋三担任自民党总裁期间，石破茂任干事长。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba served as Secretary-General while Shinzo Abe was President of the LDP.

position.zh-cn: 内阁府特命担当大臣（国家战略特别区域、地方创生担当）
position.en: Minister of State for the National Strategic Special Zones and Regional Revitalization

description.zh-cn: 石破茂在安倍晋三内阁中担任内阁府特命担当大臣。
description.en: Shigeru Ishida served as Minister of State in the cabinet of Shinzo Abe.

description.zh-cn: 2015年9月，石破茂组建了自民党内的“石破派”。
description.en: In September 2015, Shigeru Ishiba formed the 'Ishiba faction' within the LDP.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂在2024年自民党总裁选举中胜出，为其就任内阁总理大臣铺平了道路。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba won the 2024 LDP presidential election, paving the way for him to become Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂与高市早苗是2024年自民党总裁选举第二轮的主要竞争对手。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba and Sanae Takaichi were the main competitors in the second round of the 2024 LDP presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂接替岸田文雄出任第102任内阁总理大臣。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba succeeded Fumio Kishida as the 102nd Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 高市早苗接替石破茂出任内阁总理大臣。
description.en: Sanae Takaichi succeeded Shigeru Ishiba as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂在天皇德仁在位期间担任内阁总理大臣。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba served as Prime Minister under Emperor Naruhito.

position.en: Vice President of the Liberal Democratic Party

description.zh-cn: 在石破茂担任自民党总裁期间，菅义伟担任副总裁。
description.en: While Shigeru Ishiba was President of the LDP, Yoshihide Suga served as Vice President.

position.en: Secretary-General of the Liberal Democratic Party

description.zh-cn: 在石破茂担任自民党总裁期间，森山裕担任干事长。
description.en: While Shigeru Ishiba was President of the LDP, Hiroshi Moriyama served as Secretary-General.

relationships.target: 第50届日本众议院议员总选举

description.zh-cn: 石破茂上任首相后，于2024年10月9日宣布解散众议院并举行大选。
description.en: After becoming Prime Minister, Shigeru Ishiba announced the dissolution of the House of Representatives on October 9, 2024, and called a general election.

relationships.source: 第50届日本众议院议员总选举

description.zh-cn: 在2024年10月27日举行的大选中，自由民主党惨败，失去了大量议席。
description.en: In the general election held on October 27, 2024, the Liberal Democratic Party suffered a crushing defeat, losing many seats.

description.zh-cn: 2025年参议院选举的失败，导致自民党内要求石破茂辞职下台的声浪高涨，并最终促使其在同年9月7日宣布辞职。
description.en: The defeat in the 2025 House of Councillors election led to growing calls within the LDP for Shigeru Ishiba to resign, ultimately causing him to announce his resignation on September 7 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 由于旧安倍派等自民党保守派的阻力，石破茂未能在8月15日和9月2日等关键时间点发表其关于战后80周年的看法。
description.en: Due to resistance from conservative LDP factions like the old Abe faction, Shigeru Ishiba was unable to issue his views on the 80th anniversary of the end of WWII on key dates like August 15 and September 2.

description.zh-cn: 安倍谈话的存在对石破茂发表新的战后80周年官方看法构成了政治阻力。
description.en: The existence of the Abe Statement created political resistance against Shigeru Ishiba issuing a new official view on the 80th anniversary of the end of WWII.

description.zh-cn: 石破茂于2025年10月10日以个人名义发表了“石破见解”。
description.en: Shigeru Ishiba published 'Ishiba's View' as a personal statement on October 10, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 2007年11月8日，时任防卫大臣的石破茂与时任美国国防部长罗伯特·盖茨举行会面。
description.en: On November 8, 2007, Shigeru Ishiba, then Minister of Defense, met with Robert Gates, then United States Secretary of Defense.
